meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>study</kanji> <kanji>year</kanji> is kind of like the years you've studied. Where do you study? School. What is a year of study in a school? It's your <vocabulary>school grade</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
